Welcome to PerfPuppy!

 You can enable or disable data collection with the toggle button below.

 PerfPuppy comes with sensible default but can tweak it to your needs in the "Settings" section.

 All alerts will be stored in a database and you can view them in the "Alerts" section but don't forget to clear app data every now and then.
The CPU usage threshold above which PerfPuppy will generate an alert. Please notice that CPU usage computation may vary depending on device and OS version.
The memory usage threshold above which PerfPuppy will generate an alert.
The battery usage threshold below which PerfPuppy will generate an alert.
Enable data collection in background. Beware: this could cause a huge battery drain.
